data.name: GreetingMessage
data.value: Welcome to the Isa & Juanma's Picture Bot\. Send me a picture of the party and it will show up in the [website](https://cecinestpasunmariage.org/en/fotos)
data.comment: Greeting message that includes the user's first name.

data.name: EchoMessage
data.comment: Message sent to the user when the bot receives a message

data.name: Help
data.value: Just send me a picture and it will appear in the pictures [website](https://cecinestpasunmariage.org/en/fotos)

data.name: PictureAdded
data.comment: Message sent to the user when a picture is added to the website

data.name: PictureNotAdded
data.value: Sorry, I couldn't add the picture to the [website](https://cecinestpasunmariage.org/en/fotos)
data.comment: Message sent to the user when a picture is not added to the website
